SpaceRAT

class spacerat.SpaceRAT(db_url='sqlite://', source_read_url=None, source_write_url=None, schema='spacerat', model_dir=PosixPath('/Users/steve/projects/profiler/model'), debug=False)

  • db_url (str)

  • source_read_url (str)

  • source_write_url (str)

  • schema (str)

  • model_dir (PathLike)

  • debug (bool)

answer_question(question, region, time_axis=None, variant=None, filter=None, filter_arg=None, aggregate=True, query_records=False)

Finds the descriptive statistics of question for region across time_axis.

Can answer all questions in a QuestionSet across a RegionSet across time_axis.

Parameters:

  • question (spacerat.QuestionParam) – The Question to find statistics for. Can directly provide object or reference by ID.

  • region (spacerat.RegionParam) – The Region or set of Regions to find statistics of question for. Can directly provide object or reference by ID.

  • time_axis (spacerat.TimeAxis) – (optional) Time axis across which stats will be calculated. Defaults to the most recent period of time that matches the question’s source’s temporal resolution.

  • variant (str) – (optional) Geographic variant to use when calculating the statistics. Filters set of subgeographies considered in calculations.

  • aggregate (bool) – (optional) If True, calculate and return aggregate statistics at the level of the region argument’s geography.

  • filter (str) – (optional) Filter subgeog based on an argument

  • filter_arg (str) – (optional) Argument used in filter

  • query_records (bool) – If True, query and return individual records at subgeog level.

Returns:

A list results by time periods from the time axis. Statistics available in results depends on underlying data type.

Return type:

tuple[list[AggregateResultsRow], list]
